Menkes Terawan Sebut Anggota DPR 'Yang Mulia', F-PDIP Emoh
05 Nov 2019, 12:26 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Anggota Komisi IX dari Fraksi PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, meminta Menteri Kesehatan Terawan Agus Putranto tak menyebut pimpinan komisi dengan panggilan "Yang Mulia". Imbauan itu ia sampaikan di sela-sela rapat dengar pendapat atau RDP antara Komisi IX dan Kementerian Kesehatan bersama sejumlah badan.
"Pak Menteri tidak usah sebut 'Yang Mulia'. 'Yang Terhormat' saja," ujar Ribka di kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Menurut Ribka, panggilan "Yang Mulia" merujuk pada struktur kekuasaan feodal atau feodalisme. Ia menyatakan tak terlalu nyaman sebutan itu beredar di lingkungan rapat DPR.
Berdasarkan pantuan Tempo, Menteri Kesehatan Terawan beberapa kali memanggil pimpinan komisi dengan sebutan "Yang Mulia" saat mengenalkan diri dan memberikan paparannya. Adapun rapat itu dipimpin oleh politikus Partai NasDem, Felly E Runtuwene.
Terawan memang baru kali pertama mengikuti rapat di DPR sejak didapuk menjadi Menteri Kesehatan di jajaran Kabinet Indonesia Maju. Pengalaman perdana ini ia akui cukup membuat grogi.
"Saya bergetar ada di depan Anda semua. Lihat microphone ini saja baru pertama kali," tutur Terawan.
Dalam paparannya, Terawan menjelaskan seputar visi-misi Presiden Joko Widodo alias Jokowi untuk periode 2020-2024. Di antaranya meliputi penanganan stunting, pemberian dukungan jaminan nasiona kesehatan dengan membantu masalah defisit BPJS Kesehatan, hingga masalah tingginya harga obat dan optimalisasi penggunaan alat kesehatan.
Dalam rapat bersama Menkes Terawan itu, DPR turut mengundang Direktur Utama BPJS Kesehatan Fachmi Idris, Kepala Badan Kependudukan dan Keluarga Berencana Nasional atau BKKBN Hasto Wardoyo, serta Kepala Badan POM Penny K. Lukito. Ada pula Ketua Dewan Jaminan Sosial Nasional Tubagus Achmad Choesni.

Minister of Health Terawan Call Members of the Parliament 'Your Excellency', F-PDIP Emoh
05 Nov 2019, 12:26 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Commission IX member from the PDIP faction, Ribka Tjiptaning, asked Minister of Health Terawan Agus Putranto not to call the head of the commission as "Your Honor". He conveyed the appeal on the sidelines of a hearing or RDP meeting between Commission IX and the Ministry of Health along with a number of agencies.
"The Minister does not need to say 'Your Honor'. 'Just the Honorable'," Ribka said in the Parliament complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday, 5 November 2019.
According to Rebekah, the call "His Holiness" refers to the structure of feudal or feudalism power. He stated that the term was not too comfortable circulating in the DPR meeting environment.
Based on Tempo's observation, the Minister of Health Terawan several times summoned the head of the commission as "Your Honor" when introducing himself and giving his presentation. The meeting was chaired by a NasDem Party politician, Felly E Runtuwene.
Indeed Terawan was the first time attending a meeting in the House of Representatives since he was appointed Minister of Health in the ranks of the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet. This initial experience, he admitted, was quite nervous.
"I tremble in front of you all. Look at this microphone for the first time," said Terawan.
In his presentation, Terawan explained about President Joko Widodo's alias Jokowi's vision and mission for the 2020-2024 period. These include handling stunting, providing support for national health insurance by helping with BPJS Health deficit problems, to the problem of high drug prices and optimizing the use of medical devices.
In a joint meeting with the Minister of Health Terawan, the Parliament also invited the Director of the Health BPJS Fachmi Idris, the Head of the National Population and Family Planning Agency or BKKBN Hasto Wardoyo, and the Head of the POM Agency Penny K. Lukito. There was also Chairman of the National Social Security Board, Tubagus Achmad Choesni.
